20101211023511.000|20101211023513.000|CCO|23-YEAR-OLD WOMAN WAS UNAFRAID

20101211023551.000|20101211023552.429|CCO|MIRACLE.

20101211023657.667|20101211023659.333|CCO|READY TO RETURN TO PARIS TO

20101211023705.000|20101211023707.000|CCO|SHE'S BOTH A ROLE MODEL, AND, TO
